articles.title: Walmart just launched a ton more early Black Friday deals, including AirPods, Dyson stick vacuums and more - CNN

articles.description: Veterans Day 2021 is on Thursday, Nov. 11, and many restaurants are celebrating. Here is what you need to know about what chains and franchises are offering freebies to celebrate Veterans day 2021 (11/11/21).
